code: @Override protected RestChannelConsumer innerPrepareRequest(final RestRequest request, final NodeClient client) throws IOException {     try (XContentParser parser = request.contentParser()) {         String refresh = request.param("refresh").         CreateApiKeyRequestBuilder builder = new SecurityClient(client).prepareCreateApiKey(request.requiredContent(), request.getXContentType()).setRefreshPolicy((refresh != null) ? WriteRequest.RefreshPolicy.parse(request.param("refresh")) : CreateApiKeyRequest.DEFAULT_REFRESH_POLICY).         return channel -> builder.execute(new RestToXContentListener<CreateApiKeyResponse>(channel)).     } }
